lines: !throw You are not a registered player! Please use `!e new_game` first.
!throw You can't open another door in the middle of battle!
!say You're out of keys, but you have the money to buy one. {!e craft key}
!throw You're out of keys! You must either buy some more, or if you can't, `!e quit` the game in order to try again.

!var extra_output_1 You lose **5** HP!
{!e player_se {me} ID7 10}
!say âš”ï¸ Attack: ~~{minatk}-{maxatk}~~ {!e get_attack {me} min monster}-{!e get_attack {me} max monster}
!say âš”ï¸ Attack: {!e get_attack {me} min monster}-{!e get_attack {me} max monster}

!say _ _
Your next attack deals **{!tag {me} ballet_prediction}** damage.
